privacy_policy.description: with us, you will be always safe, and because your security is our priority, our team make sure that all your information are secured

1.title: Electronic medical record
1.data: Using Sila App, you can manage all your patients' records such as personal information, medical reports, medications, visit history, clinical notes, patient history, and other notes. In addition to storing and easily accessing files of various examination and pictures (x-rays, blood tests, and more) of your patients. You don't have to work on the app on your own but rather ask the nurses and aides within the clinic to work on the medical records of your patients. So, there is no need to dig further into the papers to know the past history of your patients, everything is readily available for your diagnosis.

2.title: Request to consult another doctor
2.data: In the event that you are a surgeon and you need to consult a cardiologist to know your patient’s ability to undergo surgery, you can send a consultation request through the application, whether to a specific doctor by you or a doctor chosen by the patient, and you can continue patient case during his consultation from the other doctor through The application.

3.title: Daily monitoring of the patient's condition and vital signs
3.data: With this feature, you can monitor the health status of your patients without coming to the clinic, and make sure of their vital indicators such as temperature - weight - pressure – blood sugar level and more also, on a daily basis (and more than once during the day) and continuously in order to make sure Of the stability of their condition and the progress of treatment.

4.title: Comprehensive drug Index
4.data: This feature is considered a pioneer in the medical field, and it will help you as a doctor in the field of health care, through an integrated and continuously updated drug catalog, which contains more than 18 thousand drugs. Sorted and categorized by name, scientific composition, manufacturer and many other search options.

5.title: Electronic Prescription
5.data: The electronic prescription is one of the main innovations in Sila network. It is a central feature that eliminates paper transactions and the common mistakes resulting from them. As a doctor, when you prescribe medication using the app, you do so electronically with the help of a prescription form provided by the app. Within the pharmacy, all that the patient needs is his national number or presenting the his national ID, and the pharmacist, in turn, enters the number through the application and dispenses the prescribed medicine to him. This feature allows the doctor to enter two alternatives to the prescribed drug in the event that the specified drug is not available.

7.title: Electronic search for a doctor
7.data: through this feature, the user can search for doctors according to: specialty, location of the clinic, the ability to visit within the home, and many other search options.

8.title: Electronic appointment
8.data: to organize appointments within the clinic on a daily basis, according to the clinic’s working hours, which you specify as a doctor, such as days and working hours, and you can also amend appointments as a doctor in addition to acceptance and rejection, and all of this can also be done by the nurses or assistants within the clinic.

9.title: Doctor accounts
9.data: Being a doctor means your constant preoccupation and your need for an assistant or a nurse within the clinic, and therefore Sila has assigned to each doctor within the application two assistant accounts that have the ability to enter information and organize appointments, with the presence of a review feature by the doctor to ensure accuracy.
